quote: 'Enough' is a feast.
author: Buddhist Proverb

quote: It’s a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
author: Germany Kent

quote: The heart that gives thanks is a happy one, for we cannot feel thankful and unhappy at the same time.
author: Douglas Wood

quote: Piglet noticed that even though he had a Very Small Heart, it could hold a rather large amount of Gratitude.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak, and it will feed every corner of your life.
author: Rumi

quote: Though they only take a second to say, thank yous leave a warm feeling behind that can last for hours.
author: Kent Allan Rees

quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
author: Epicurus

quote: True forgiveness is when you can, ''Thank you for the experience.''
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Let gratitude be the pillow upon which you kneel to say your nightly prayer. And let faith be the bridge you build to overcome evil and welcome good.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If the only prayer you said was thank you, that would be enough.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: We must find time to stop and thank the people who make a difference in our lives.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Gratitude looks to the Past and love to the Present; fear, avarice, lust, and ambition look ahead.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Gratitude is the ability to experience life as a gift. It liberates us from the prison of self-preoccupation.
author: John Ortberg

quote: When I think of how many people in this world have it worse than I do, I realize just how blessed I really am... and I have to give thanks ...
author: Shannan Lea

quote: If you fail to carry around with you a heart of gratitude for the love you’ve been so freely given, it is easy for you not to love others as you should.
author: Paul David Tripp

quote: Gratitude and attitude are not challenges; they are choices.
author: Robert Braathe

quote: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Rest and be thankful.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: I lie in bed at night, after ending my prayers with the words 'Ich danke dir für all das Gute und Liebe und Schöne.' (Thank you, God, for all that is good and dear and beautiful.)
author: Anne Frank

quote: O Lord that lends me life, lend me a heart replete with thankfulness.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I’m still thanking all the stars, one by one.
author: Marissa Meyer

quote: Thankfulness is the quickest path to joy.
author: Jefferson Bethke

quote: There’s a kind of holiness to love, requited or not, and those people who don’t receive it with gratitude are arrogant beyond saving.
author: Marisa de los Santos

quote: Gratitude goes beyond the 'mine' and 'thine' and claims the truth that all of life is a pure gift.
author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quote: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
author: Margaret Cousins

quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn’t learn a lot today, at least we learned a little, and if we didn’t learn a little, at least we didn’t get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn’t die; so, let us all be thankful.
author: Buddha

quote: I looked around and thought about my life. I felt grateful. I noticed every detail. That is the key to time travel. You can only move if you are actually in the moment. You have to be where you are to get where you need to go.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: As with all commandments, gratitude is a description of a successful mode of living. The thankful heart opens our eyes to a multitude of blessings that continually surround us.
author: James E. Faust

quote: At times, our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Learn to be thankful for what you already have, while you pursue all that you want.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: ‘Thank you‘ is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Brault

quote: The way to develop the best that is in a person is by appreciation and encouragement.
author: Charles Schwab

quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: None is more impoverished than the one who has no gratitude. Gratitude is a currency that we can mint for ourselves, and spend without fear of bankruptcy.
author: Fred De Witt Van Amburgh

quote: Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: Remember, being happy doesn’t mean you have it all. It simply means you are thankful for all you have
author: Anonymous

quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Two kinds of gratitude: The sudden kind we feel for what we take; the larger kind we feel for what we give.
author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
author: Jacques Maritain

quote: I’ve had a remarkable life. I seem to be in such good places at the right time. You know, if you were to ask me to sum my life up in one word, gratitude.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude. Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Opening your eyes to more of the world around you can deeply enhance your gratitude practice.
author: Derrick Carpenter

quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals. If you aren’t grateful for what you already have, what makes you think you would be happy with more.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Train yourself never to put off the word or action for the expression of gratitude.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
author: Doris Day

quote: Gratitude is an antidote to negative emotions, a neutralizer of envy, hostility, worry, and irritation. It is savoring; it is not taking things for granted; it is present-oriented.
author: Sonja Lyubomirsky

quote: What separates privilege from entitlement is gratitude.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
author: Anonymous

quote: Gratitude is a powerful catalyst for happiness. It’s the spark that lights a fire of joy in your soul.
author: Amy Collette

quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: My grandfather told me once that happiness is an expression of gratitude. And it’s never wrong to be grateful.
author: Amy Harmon

quote: No one who achieves success does so without the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: In ordinary life, we hardly realize that we receive a great deal more than we give, and that it is only with gratitude that life becomes rich.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Gratitude is when memory is stored in the heart and not in the mind.
author: Lionel Hampton

quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Gratitude will shift you to a higher frequency, and you will attract much better things.
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Before you achieve your goal, be grateful for the journey.
author: Justin Ho

quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
author: Epictetus

quote: The root of joy is gratefulness.
author: David Steindl-Rast

quote: Being thankful is not always experienced as a natural state of existence, we must work at it, akin to a type of strength training for the heart.
author: Larissa Gomez

quote: The revelation of kindness hurts worse than cruelty. There is no way to equal it. Nowhere to put her gratitude, and so it thrashes in her body.
author: Emily Ruskovich

quote: Be thankful for what you have; you’ll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don’t have, you will never, ever have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Gratitude for the present moment and the fullness of life now is the true prosperity.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
author: Aesop

quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: You cannot do a kindness too soon because you never know how soon it will be too late.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: We often take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude.
author: Cynthia Ozick

quote: Nothing is more honorable than a grateful heart.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Today I choose to live with gratitude for the love that fills my heart, the peace that rests within my spirit, and the voice of hope that says all things are possible.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you concentrate on finding whatever is good in every situation, you will discover that your life will suddenly be filled with gratitude, a feeling that nurtures the soul.
author: Rabbi Harold Kushner

quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
author: Gilbert C. Chesterton

quote: Gratitude helps you to grow and expand; gratitude brings joy and laughter into your life and into the lives of all those around you.
author: Eileen Caddy

quote: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it’s all an experience.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future, not to amuse ourselves with either hopes or fears but to rest satisfied with what we have, which is sufficient, for he that is so wants nothing. The greatest blessings of mankind are within us and within our reach. A wise man is content with his lot, whatever it may be, without wishing for what he has not.
author: Seneca

quote: Always remember people who have helped you along the way, and don’t forget to lift someone up.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought; and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: In the end, though, maybe we must all give up trying to pay back the people in this world who sustain our lives. In the end, maybe it's wiser to surrender before the miraculous scope of human generosity and to just keep saying thank you, forever and sincerely, for as long as we have voices.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Being grateful does not mean that everything is necessarily good. It just means that you can accept it as a gift.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The ship of my life may or may not be sailing on calm and amiable seas. The challenging days of my existence may or may not be bright and promising. Stormy or sunny days, glorious or lonely nights, I maintain an attitude of gratitude. If I insist on being pessimistic, there is always tomorrow. Today I am blessed.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You pray in your distress and in your need; would that you might pray also in the fullness of your joy and in your days of abundance.
author: Kahill Gibran

quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
author: James Herriot

quote: When one has a grateful heart, life is so beautiful.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: It doesn't matter what you did or where you were...it matters where you are and what you're doing. Get out there! Sing the song in your heart and NEVER let anyone shut you up!!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: My expectations were reduced to zero when I was 21. Everything since then has been a bonus.
author: Stephen W. Hawking

quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
author: Voltaire

quote: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: ...for love casts out fear, and gratitude can conquer pride.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Dance. Smile. Giggle. Marvel. TRUST. HOPE. LOVE. WISH. BELIEVE. Most of all, enjoy every moment of the journey, and appreciate where you are at this moment instead of always focusing on how far you have to go.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Everyone enjoys being acknowledged and appreciated. Sometimes even the simplest act of gratitude can change someone's entire day. Take the time to recognize and value the people around you and appreciate those who make a difference in your lives.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love—then make that day count!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: When a person doesn’t have gratitude, something is missing in his or her humanity. A person can almost be defined by his or her attitude toward gratitude.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The highest tribute to the dead is not grief but gratitude.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Dead people receive more flowers than the living ones because regret is stronger than gratitude.
author: Anne Frank

quote: My religion is nature. That’s what arouses those feelings of wonder and mysticism and gratitude in me.
author: Oliver Sacks

quote: Let us give thanks for our shadows for they are there in the first place because of the presence of light.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Love, forgiveness, modesty, humility and gratitude are most important virtues in life.
author: P. Remes

quote: Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos — the trees, the clouds, everything.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The problem that we have with a victim mentality is that we forget to see the blessings of the day. Because of this, our spirit is poisoned instead of nourished.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Gratitude is a sign of maturity...Where there is appreciation: there is also courtesy and concern for the rights and property of others.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: This year, mend a quarrel. Seek out a forgotten friend. Dismiss suspicion and replace it with trust. Write a letter. Give a soft answer. Encourage youth. Manifest your loyalty in word and deed. Keep a promise. Forgo a grudge. Forgive an enemy. Apologize. Try to understand. Examine your demands on others. Think first of someone else. Be kind. Be gentle. Laugh a little more. Express your gratitude. Welcome a stranger. Gladden the heart of a child. Take pleasure in the beauty and wonder of the earth. Speak your love and then speak it again.
author: Howard W. Hunter

quote: Those who have the ability to be grateful are the ones who have the ability to achieve greatness.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Men are more ready to repay an injury than a benefit, because gratitude is a burden and revenge a pleasure
author: Tacitus

quote: For each new morning with its light, For rest and shelter of the night, For health and food, for love and friends, For everything Thy goodness sends.
author: Ralph Emerson

quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
author: W. T. Purkiser

quote: There is power in having gratitude and giving thanks for what you have; it attracts more to you.
author: Idowu Koyenikan

quote: You stand for what is right, Lina, without the expectation of gratitude or reward.
author: Ruta Sepetys

quote: We're a nation hungry for more joy: Because we're starving from a lack of gratitude.
author: Brené Brown

quote: Got no checkbooks, got no banks. Still I'd like to express my thanks - I've got the sun in the mornin' and the moon at night.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: Happiness can only be achieved by looking inward & learning to enjoy whatever life has and this requires transforming greed into gratitude.
author: John Chrysostom

quote: God gave you a gift of 84,600 seconds today. Have you used one of them to say thank you?
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: The more I understand the mind and the human experience, the more I begin to suspect there is no such thing as unhappiness; there is only ungratefulness.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Money matters but less than we think and not in the way that we think. Family is important. So are friends. Envy is toxic. So is excessive thinking. Beaches are optional. Trust is not. Neither is gratitude.
author: Eric Weiner

quote: Time erodes gratitude more quickly than it does beauty!
author: Mario Puzo

quote: The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: And I have by me, for my comfort, two strange white flowers - shriveled now, and brown and flat and brittle - to witness that even when mind and strength had gone, gratitude and a mutual tenderness still lived on in the heart of men.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: It took untold generations to get you where you are. A little gratitude might be in order. If you're going to insist on bending the world to your way, you better have your reasons.
author: Jordan B. Peterson

quote: The truth is I do love you. Admitting that means opening myself up to all that pain when you leave. After you realize this wasn’t love, but gratitude.
author: Kelly Moran

quote: Gratitude means to recognize the good in your life, be thankful for whatever you have, some people may not even have one of those things you consider precious to you (love, family, friends etc). Each day give thanks for the gift of life.You are blessed
author: Pablo

quote: There is strange comfort in knowing that no matter what happens today, the Sun will rise again tomorrow.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: An attitude of gratitude brings great things.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: How long will this last, this delicious feeling of being alive, of having penetrated the veil which hides beauty and the wonders of celestial vistas? It doesn't matter, as there can be nothing but gratitude for even a glimpse of what exists for those who can become open to it.
author: Alexander Shulgin

quote: We don’t truly appreciate what we have until it’s gone… We don’t really appreciate something until we have experienced some events; we don't really appreciate our parents until we ourselves have become parents. Be grateful for what you have now, and nothing should be taken for granted.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: My gratitude for good writing is unbounded; I’m grateful for it the way I’m grateful for the ocean.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Love of God is pure when joy and suffering inspire an equal degree of gratitude.
author: Simone Weil

quote: And now...farewell to kindness, humanity and gratitude. I have substituted myself for Providence in rewarding the good; may the God of vengeance now yield me His place to punish the wicked.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Gratitude is the beginning of wisdom. Stated differently, true wisdom cannot be obtained unless it is built on a foundation of true humility and gratitude.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: He who does not reflect his life back to God in gratitude does not know himself.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Breath is the finest gift of nature. Be grateful for this wonderful gift.
author: Amit Ray

quote: It’s [old age] not a surprise, we knew it was coming – make the most of it. So you may not be as fast on your feet, and the image in your mirror may be a little disappointing, but if you are still functioning and not in pain, gratitude should be the name of the game.
author: Betty White

quote: Whatever you appreciate and give thanks for will increase in your life.
author: Sanaya Roman

quote: When we learn to read the story of Jesus and see it as the story of the love of God, doing for us what we could not do for ourselves--that insight produces, again and again, a sense of astonished gratitude which is very near the heart of authentic Christian experience.
author: N.T. Wright

quote: I have noticed that the Universe loves Gratitude. The more Grateful you are, the more goodies you get
author: Louise Hay

quote: Be happy, noble heart, be blessed for all the good thou hast done and wilt do hereafter, and let my gratitude remain in obscurity like your good deeds.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: A grateful mindset can set you free from the prison of disempowerment and the shackles of misery.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Thankfulness creates gratitude which generates contentment that causes peace.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Take full account of what Excellencies you possess, and in gratitude remember how you would hanker after them, if you had them not.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If we are to feel the positive feelings of love, happiness, trust, and gratitude, we periodically also have to feel anger, sadness, fear, and sorrow.
author: John Gray

quote: Gratitude is the beginning of civility, of decency and goodness, of a recognition that we cannot afford to be arrogant. We should walk with the knowledge that we will need help every step of the way.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The way to move out of judgement is to move into gratitude
author: Neale Donald Walsh

quote: The root of joy is gratefulness...It is not joy that makes us grateful; it is gratitude that makes us joyful.
author: Brother David Steindl-Rast

quote: They do not love, that do not show their love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: In life one has a choice to take one of two paths: to wait for some special day - or to celebrate each special day.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Everyone creates realities based on their own personal beliefs. These beliefs are so powerful that they can create [expansive or entrapping] realities over and over.~Kuan Yin
author: Hope Bradford

quote: I thank the universe for taking everything it has taken and giving to me everything it is giving-balance
author: Rupi Kaur

quote: I used to think how lucky she was to have me, but now I realize that’s backwards. A spirit of gratitude yields patience, love, and forgiveness.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: I may not be where I want to be but I'm thankful for not being where I used to be.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: It has been said that life has treated me harshly; and sometimes I have complained in my heart because many pleasures of human experience have been withheld from me…if much has been denied me, much, very much, has been given me…
author: Helen Keller

quote: We only live once. We all have an expiration date after that we will never come again. I am not saying that to make you sad. I am saying that so you can cherish each moment in your life and be grateful that you are here and you are Special
author: Pablo

quote: Gratitude doesn't change the scenery.  It merely washes clean the glass you look through so you can clearly see the colors.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Gratitude takes less energy than anger.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: Gratitude is medicine for a heart devastated by tragedy.  If you can only be thankful for the blue sky, then do so.
author: Richelle e. Goodrich

quote: The most beautiful moments in life are moments when you are expressing your joy, not when you are seeking it.
author: Jaggi Vasudev

quote: Regardless of Sunshine or Rain, Be Thankful for another GREAT day…and treat Life as the ULTIMATE Gift.... Because IT IS
author: Pablo

quote: Darkness deserves gratitude. It is the alleluia point at which we learn to understand that all growth does not take place in the sunlight.
author: Joan Chittister

quote: I loathe a friend whose gratitude grows old, a friend who takes his friend's prosperity but will not voyage with him in his grief
author: Euripides

quote: Your dream is a reality that is waiting for you to materialize. Today is a new day! Don’t let your history interfere with your destiny! Learn from your past so that it can empower your present and propel you to greatness
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: when a child gives you a gift, even if it is a rock they just picked up, exude gratitude. it may be the only thing they have to give, and they have chosen to give it to you
author: Dean Jackson

quote: I think that real friendship always makes us feel such sweet gratitude, because the world almost always seems like a very hard desert, and the flowers that grow there seem to grow against such high odds.
author: Stephen King

quote: A sense of entitlement is a cancerous thought process that is void of gratitude and can be deadly to our relationships.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Gratitude for the seemingly insignificant—a seed—this plants the giant miracle.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: A little 'thank you' that you will say to someone for a 'little favour' shown to you is a key to unlock the doors that hide unseen 'greater favours'. Learn to say 'thank you' and why not?
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Being in the habit of saying 'Thank you,' of making sure that people receive attention so they know you value them, of not presuming that people will always be there--this is a good habit, regardless...make sure to give virtual and actual high-fives to those who rock and rock hard.
author: Sarah Wendell

quote: Can you accept the notion that once you change your internal state, you don’t need the external world to provide you with a reason to feel joy, gratitude, appreciation, or any other elevated emotion?
author: Joe Dispenza

quote: Courtesies of a small and trivial character are the ones which strike deepest in the grateful and appreciating heart.
author: Henry Clay

quote: The fool’s life is empty of gratitude and full of fears; its course lies wholly toward the future.
author: Epicurus

quote: Death is no enemy, but the foundation of gratitude, sympathy, and art. Of all life's pleasures, only love owes no debt to death.
author: Anita Diamant

quote: Thank you' is a wonderful phrase. Use it. It will add stature to your soul.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: One can never pay in gratitude: one can only pay 'in kind' somewhere else in life.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: When you express gratitude for the blessings that come into your life, it not only encourages the universe to send you more, it also sees to it that those blessings remain.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Be thankful for your allotment in an imperfect world.  Though better circumstances can be imagined, far worse are nearer misses than you probably care to realize.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: The most fortunate are those who have a wonderful capacity to appreciate again and again, freshly and naively, the basic goods of life, with awe, pleasure, wonder and even ecstasy.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: Pity is not forgiveness, nor is gratitude absolution.
author: Pierce Brown

quote: A person with gratitude will always be respected and loved.
author: Master Jun Hong Lu

quote: Nearly all vices are rooted in the future. Gratitude looks to the past and love to the present; fear, avarice, lust and ambition look ahead.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: To see someone you love, in a bad setting, is one of the great barometers of gratitude.
author: Aimee Bender

quote: It's in those quiet little towns, at the edge of the world, that you will find the salt of the earth people who make you feel right at home.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: Gratitude paints little smiley faces on everything it touches.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: My gratitude to him is as boundless as the Pacific ocean.
author: Yann Martel

quote: Emit gratitude as though it was done
author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quote: When every benefit received is a right, there is no place for good manners, let alone for gratitude.
author: Theodore Dalrymple

quote: ... Harboring an emotion as powerful as gratitude has power of its own.
author: Richard Paul Evans

quote: ... because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
author: Wallace D. Wattles

quote: Every once in a while God allows you to stub your toe as a kind reminder to be grateful for the miraculous body attached to it.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Gratitude, not understanding, is the secret to joy and equanimity.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Gratitude is the real treasure God wants us to find, because it isn't the pot of gold but the rainbow that colors our world.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Real devotion is an unbroken receptivity to the truth. Real devotion is rooted in an awed and reverent gratitude, but one that is lucid, grounded, and intelligent.
author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quote: I count myself lucky, having long ago won a lottery paid to me in seven sunrises a week for life.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Unwanted favours gain no gratitude.
author: Sophocles

quote: Gratitude bestows reverence.....changing forever how we experience life and the world.
author: John Milton

quote: My gratitude extends beyond the limits of my capacity to express it,
author: Iain M. Banks

quote: Our Job is not to make young women grateful. It is to make the ungrateful so they keep going. Gratitude never radicalized anybody
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Revenge is profitable, gratitude is expensive.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: Gratitude is born in the struggle. And we have definitely struggled.
author: Colleen Hoover

quote: I see the glass half full and thank God for what I have.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: A man becomes a Buddha the moment he accepts all that life brings with gratitude.
author: Osho

quote: You are human, you will make mistakes, and it’s one of the most beautiful things about being human, but you must learn from your mistakes, otherwise your life will have a lot of unnecessary pain.
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: Thank God I have seen an orange sky with purple clouds. How easy it is to forget that we have the privilege of living in God's art gallery.
author: Erica Goros

quote: Act with kindness but do not expect gratitude.
author: Confucius

quote: Even the smallest tender mercy can bring peace when recognized and appreciated.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: The soul that gives thanks can find comfort in everything; the soul that complains can find comfort in nothing.
author: Hannah Whitall Smith

quote: Always there is something worth saying about glory, about gratitude.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: But it seemed to me that this was the way we all lived: full to the brim with gratitude and joy one day, wrecked on the rocks the next. Finding the balance between the two was the art and the salvation.
author: Elizabeth Berg

quote: Some of the best things that have ever happened to us wouldn’t have happened to us, if it weren’t for some of the worst things that have ever happened to us.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: If we want to keep the blessings of life coming to us, we must learn to be grateful for whatever is given.
author: Harold Klemp

quote: Every morning when I wake up, I kiss her forehead as symbol of gratitude and appreciation and she repays me back with a lovely smile.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: Make enthusiasm a way of life. Make optimism a way of success. Make gratitude a way of happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Ungrateful people forget what they are not grateful for.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: Gratitude is one of the most powerful human emotions. Once expressed, it changes attitude, brightens outlook, and broadens our perspective.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Thrill me, chill me I went in search of money and success, all I got was a bellyful of excess! Now that I've realigned myself I’m on my tip-toes because life is sweet! I'm overwhelmed with gratitude for all the blessings that are manifesting in my life … neat!
author: Stephen Richards

quote: A sudden happiness catches me unawares. I feel it trickling into me, and my eyes go liquid with gratitude and hope.
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: Beware: It is a quick transition from a nourishing sense of gratitude to a poisonous sense of entitlement.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If future generations are to remember us with gratitude rather than contempt, we must leave them more than the miracles of technology. We must leave them a glimpse of the world as it was in the beginning, not just after we got through with it.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: It’s up to us to choose contentment and thankfulness now—and to stop imagining that we have to have everything perfect before we’ll be happy.
author: Joanna Gaines

quote: Gratitude’s got a short half-life, Clarice.
author: Thomas Harris

quote: The finished man, you know, is difficult to please; a growing mind will ever show you gratitude.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A sincere attitude of gratitude is a beatitude for secured altitudes. Appreciate what you have been given and you will be promoted higher.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Gratitude is a euphemism for resentment.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Is the height of my chara joy dependent on the depths of my eucharisteo thanks?
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: Gratitude bestows reverence, allowing us to encounter everyday epiphanies, those transcendent moments of awe that change forever how we experience life and the world.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Wealth can also be that attitude of gratitude with which we remind ourselves everyday to count our blessings.
author: Chris Gardner

quote: You will never accept gratitude as a solution to your problems, until you have reached the last stage of grief--acceptance.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Ingratitude produces pride while gratitude produces humility.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: Practicing an attitude of gratitude spills over to acts of generosity.
author: Debbie Macomber

quote: Dear world, I am excited to be alive in you, and I am thankful for another year.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: The roses of romance grow when you water your relationship with gratitude. Love will bloom and blossom when you recognize the awesome.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: Hurry always empties a soul.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: But once you accept the fact that you have always been alone, and will always be, then your perspective can begin to change. You can become aware of the small kindnesses, the little comforts. Be grateful for them.
author: Linda Olsson

quote: What well-bred woman would refuse her heart to a man who had just saved her life? Not one; and gratitude is a short cut which speedily leads to love.
author: Théophile Gautier

quote: From this point forward, you don’t even know how to quit in life.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: And I'm thankful, in that moment, full to the brim with gratitude that Christian is with me. He's here. My partner. My best friend.
author: Cynthia Hand

quote: Don't ever stop believing in your own transformation. It is still happening even on days you may not realize it or feel like it.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: There is no such thing as gratitude unexpressed. If it is unexpressed, it is plain, old-fashioned ingratitude.
author: Robert Brault

quote: But you're an artist. You don't believe in decency and honesty and gratitude.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: Happiness is the experience of living every moment with love, grace and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Any day above ground is a good day. Before you complain about anything, be thankful for your life and the things that are still going well.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Gratitude is the sweetest thing in a seeker's life- in all human life. If there is gratitude in your heart, then there will be tremendous sweetness in your eyes.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: Like all lawyers, I was delighted by gratitude. It happened so rarely.
author: C.J. Sansom

quote: You were formed inside a borrowed womb—a nourishing safe haven for months—then delivered through painful effort and sacrifice by a woman willing to give you the precious gift of life. That truth alone deserves your gratitude and respect.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: I pity the man who praises God only when things go his way.
author: Criss Jami

quote: We owe a lot to the Indians, who taught us how to count, without which no worthwhile scientific discovery could have been made.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you concentrate on finding whatever is good in every situation, you will discover that your life will suddenly be filled with gratitude, a feeling that nurtures the soul
author: Harold S. Kushner

quote: When we can do nothing else, we can still love, without expecting any reward or change or gratitude.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: One grateful thought is a ray of sunshine.  A hundred such thoughts paint a sunrise.  A thousand will rival the glaring sky at noonday - for gratitude is light against the darkness.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: For a wise man, I have been told, once said, ‘Gratitude is best and most effective when it does not evaporate in empty phrases.’ But alas, my lady, I am but a mass of empty phrases, it would seem.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: We are never quits with those who oblige us, `was Dantes' reply;` for when we do not owe them money, we owe them gratitude.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: I don't have to do this alone. If I had my gratitude journal on me now, that's what I would write.
author: Cynthia Hand

quote: One minute of sincere gratitude can wash away a lifetime’s disappointments.
author: Silvia Hartmann

quote: Having gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a gift and not deliver it.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Here is the world, and you live in it, and are grateful. You try to be grateful.
author: Michael Cunningham

quote: If you aren't happy for what you already have then what makes you think you will be happy with more.
author: Maddy Malhotra

quote: Expectation has brought me disappointment. Disappointment has brought me wisdom. Acceptance, gratitude and appreciation have brought me joy and fulfilment.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: There is a calmness to a life lived in gratitude, a quiet joy.
author: Ralph H. Blum

quote: There wasn't enough gratitude in the world for a server who kept drinks coming at a time like this.
author: Jennifer Crusie

quote: Don't count your blessings, let your blessings count! EnjoyLife!
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: Give thanks to the earth for the hospitality and generosity, Show gratitude for life, light and every little beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am so grateful for the many times God has shown me the mercy of not giving me what I want.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The value we place on what we've been given correlates to our depth of gratitude for it.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Those who are not grateful soon begin to complain of everything.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Satan will tempt you with many things in life, but the most powerful is the temptation to be grateful for what you have, when it is not the best life God had to offer you.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Everyone is my teacher. Some I seek. Some I subconsciously attract. Often I learn simply by observing others. Some may be completely unaware that I’m learning from them, yet I bow deeply in gratitude.
author: Eric Allen

quote: His gratitude widened his smile and bent his back.
author: Arundhati Roy

quote: The fragrance of romance is gratitude. Nothing says I love you like saying I love you. Sure, it’s better to show your love, but why not also say it?
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: Steam seems to have killed all gratitude in the hearts of sailors.
author: Jules Verne

quote: When the voice and the vision on the inside is more profound, and more clear and loud than all opinions on the outside, you've begun to master your life
author: John Demartini

quote: In an expression of true gratitude, sadness is conspicuous only by its absence
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The most attractive thing about you should have less to do with your face or body and more to do with your attitude and how you treat people.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Men are more ready to repay an injury than a benefit, because gratitude is a burden and revenge a pleasure.
author: Robert Greene

quote: Gratitude was never meant to be an excuse for giving up on the obstacles God has put before you. Some of the most magical things he can bring us require faith and a lot of planning.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: We can lift ourselves, and others as well, when we refuse to remain in the realm of negative thought and cultivate within our hearts an attitude of gratitude.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Appreciate your mom. She is wiser than you think and stronger than you know. Be thankful.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Every day, tell at least one person something you like, admire, or appreciate about them.
author: Richard Carlson

quote: This, I think, is how people survive: Even when horrible things have been done to us, we can still find gratitude in one another.
author: David Levithan

quote: An appreciating heart radiates happiness. Gratitude fills your life with bliss and joyfulness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What was so miraculous about a relationship that was based more on my gratitude than on mutual self respect?
author: Justina Chen Headley

quote: But gratitude would not have me love you as I do. Love was inspired by what you are - the good, the bad, and even the foolish, which is what you're being right now.
author: Mary Jo Putney

quote: I don't recognise any of my emotions any more. There's no such thing as plain joy or grief. It's horror and relief and panic and gratitude all jumbled together.
author: Elizabeth Wein

quote: Ingratitude is a crime more despicable than revenge, which is only returning evil for evil, while ingratitude returns evil for good.
author: William George Jordan

quote: I am grateful for all the trials for that made be a better person.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Do not count on the gratitude of deeds done for people in the past,you must make them grateful for things you will do for them in the future.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: Making the ungrateful grateful will bring tears to your eyes, tears of blood bleeding from the heart.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: The grateful heart sits at a continuous feast.
author: Anonymous

quote: In every class of society, gratitude is the rarest of all human virtues.
author: Wilkie Collins

quote: Happiness isn't complicated. It is a humble state of gratitude for simple pleasures, tender mercies, recognized blessings, and inherent beauty.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Even the masochists tell everything when tortured. From sheer gratitude.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Gratitude is looking on the brighter side of life, even if it means hurting your eyes.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
author: Karl Barth

quote: I still miss those I loved who are no longer with me but I find I am grateful for having loved them. The gratitude has finally conquered the loss.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: When you can no longer tell the difference between being yourself and being love, you are not far from waking up.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Instead of relief or gratitude, more guilt washes over me. Andy's certainly not faultless - no one ever is in a marriage
author: Emily Giffin

quote: he wanted to prostrate at newton's alter and weep with gratitude for the blessing that made all things fall to the goddamn ground
author: J.R. Ward

quote: I feel a rush of gratitude so strong, it feels almost like love.
author: Paula Hawkins

quote: Gratitude and love are always multiplied when you give freely. It is an infinite source of contentment and prosperous energy.
author: Jim Fargiano

quote: Gratitude is the appreciation of things that are not deserved, earned or demanded - those wonderful things that we take for granted.
author: Renée Paule

quote: Superficial social niceties are far different from the deep emotion of thanksgiving.
author: Alexandra Katehakis

quote: Gratitude is the quality of being thankful and the readiness to show appreciation in return.
author: Renée Carlino

quote: Thanksgiving for God’s faithfulness in our pain is the indisputable proof that we believe God is a part of our pain.
author: Erwin W. Lutzer

quote: We walk through so many myths of each other and ourselves; we are so thankful when someone sees us for who we are and accepts us.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: The high road of grace will get you somewhere a whole lot faster then the freeway of spite.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: The more we express thanks, the more gratitude we feel. The more gratitude we feel, the more we express thanks. It's circular, and it leads to a happier life.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: The object is to keep busy being something...as opposed to doing something. We are all sent here to bring more gratitude, more kindness, more forgiveness and more love into this world. That is too big a job to be accomplished by just a few.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quote: The circumstances surrounding your birth is not as important as the opportunity to live life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Thank you, Tempest, for loving me when understanding was too hard. Thank you for understanding when loving me is impossible.
author: Tracy Deebs

quote: All these types of love come out of duty, respect, and gratitude. Most of them, as the women in my county know, are sources of sadness, rupture, and brutality.
author: Lisa See

quote: All that we know about those we have loved and lost is that they would wish us to remember them with a more intensified realization of their reality. What is essential does not die but clarifies. The highest tribute to the dead is not grief but gratitude.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Gratitude also opens your eyes to the limitless potential of the universe, while dissatisfaction closes your eyes to it.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Amazement + Gratitude + Openness + Appreciation = an irresistible field of energy
author: Frederick Dodson

quote: Looking behind, I am lifted with gratitude. Looking forward, I am filled with vision. Looking upward, I am filled with strength. Looking within, I discover peace.
author: Dr. Sukhraj Dhillon

quote: There is a worse tyranny than that of ill-treatment. It is the tyranny of tears, vapours, appeals to feelings of affection and of gratitude!
author: Georgette Heyer

quote: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: There’s some real utility in gratitude. It’s also good protection against the dangers of victimhood and resentment.
author: Jordan B. Peterson

quote: Preserve a sense of proportion in your attitude to everything that pleases you, and make the most of them while they are at their best.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Life-changing gratitude does not fasten to a life unless nailed through with one very specific nail at a time.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: Life finds its balance. Children grow up. Second chances come along. In the meantime, I could choose to savor this moment. What good would it do to allow annoyance to interfere with gratitude?
author: Katrina Kenison

quote: It was the exaggerated gratitude that came with immigrant insecurity.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: Those who achieve the extraordinary are usually the most ordinary because they have nothing to prove to anybody. Be Humble.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: According to Lyubomirsky, the three factors that seem to have the greatest influence on increasing our happiness are our ability to reframe our situation more positively, our ability to experience gratitude, and our choice to be kind and generous.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: The truist indication of gratitude is to return what you are grateful for.
author: Richard Paul Evans

quote: And perhaps the greatest blessing was that we never knew how short the time was.
author: Stephen King

quote: Tomorrow is not a promise. Tomorrow is a second chance.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: Gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
author: G K Chesterton

quote: By acknowledging their contribution and letting them go with gratitude, you will be able to truly put the things you own, and your life, in order.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: Gratitude is an overflow of the pleasure filling your soul.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: If you're not grateful for what you already have, why should you be blessed with more...
author: Germany Kent

quote: A mindset of gratitude lifts the veil of bitterness and allows you to see beauty and possibility.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Life is a web of intersections and choices. Your 1st choice is to recognize an intersection. Your 2nd choice is to be grateful for it.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: The people that surround us mirror who we are.
author: The Letters Of Gratitude

quote: We love our partners for who they are, not for who they are not.
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: When I count my blessings, I find you in every one.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich
